Schedule Advising Appointments through OneDePaul. Bio and Research Information Marcus Schaefer came to CDM in 1999 as an Assistant Professor of computer science after finishing his PhD at the University of Chicago. Previously, he had obtained master degrees in mathematics and computer science at the Universitaet Karlsruhe in Germany. He pursues research in computational complexity, graph theory, and graph drawing. Research Area Theory Specific Research Area Complexity theory, computability theory, combinatorics, graph theory.
